description: Smarty Bubbles 2 is an engaging and addictive bubble-shooting game that will have players hooked from the first shot. With just a mouse click, players aim and shoot colorful bubbles at a cluster of floating bubbles above. The objective is to match and pop groups of bubbles of the same color by hitting them with an accurately aimed arrow
name: Smarty Bubbles 2
